T01n813u_001:13: ṛṣividadā deva-nāga-yakṣa-rākṣasa-śakra-brahma-lokapāla-viṣṇu-maheśvara-nārāyaṇa-skanda kuberāsurendra-mātṛgaṇa namaskṛtaṃ vajrakṣuramahīyaṃ hayagrīvabrahma paramahṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmi |
T01n813u_001:15: amoghaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ viṣāṇāñca vināyanam | tad yathā
T01n813u_001:16: om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarvaviṣaghātaka sarvabhūtavidrāvaka jvalitānalavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarātopāpravitakāya vajrakṣuranirgatita calitavasudhātala bajrodaśvasata hāsita-marutakṣatipraśamanakara paraduṣṭavighnān saṃbhakṣaṇakara svavidyopadeśakara paramaśāntikara buddha buddha bodhayāmiti |
T01n813u_001:20: sidhya sidhya sarvakarmasu me siddhe dehi dehi |
T01n813u_001:21: āveśa āveśa praveśa praveśa sarvagraheṣu apratihata |
T01n813u_001:22: dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna matha matha pramatha pramatha sarvavaropagrama |
T01n813u_001:28: nityāparaprekṣaṇa trāsaya trāsaya mahābodhisattva ṛddhadaṃṣṭraṇena sarvabhayebhyaḥ sattvānāṃ rakṣa rakṣa |
T01n813u_001:29: mama buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ kuru kuru phaṭ |
T01n813u_001:38: ye kecit mama ahiteṣiṇaḥ kāye kramanti mantrayaṇa yamanti juhvānati kākhordaṃ kurvanti |
T01n813u_001:40: namaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahotsādanāya hayagrīvāya sidhyantu mantrapadaiḥ svāhā |
T01n813u_001:41: om amitodbhavāya huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā |
